message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
for (String metricName : metriDps.keySet()) {
    Iterator<DataPoint> it = metriDps.get(metricName).iterator();
    while (it.hasNext()) {
        DataPoint dp = it.next();
        MetricMap map = new MetricMap();
        map.setName(metricName);
        map.setTime(String.valueOf(dp.getTimestamp()));
        metricMaps.put(map, String.valueOf(dp.getValue()));
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: Instead of using a for-each loop to iterate over the list of DataPoints, you can use an Iterator. This allows you to call the next() method to get the next DataPoint in the list. This way, you can iterate over all the DataPoints for each metric name in the metriDps map.
